name: Cold Press Juicer, Masticating Juicer with 5.4" Wide Feed Chute, 350w Slow Juicer Machines Fit Whole Vegetables and Fruits with High Juice Yield, Easy to Clean (Black)
short_description: 【Easy and Cold Press Juicer Safe to Operate】Our masticating juicer comes with a large feed chute with a blade-less design that stops the machine when the lid is opened. It not only improves juicing efficiency, but also ensures safety 【50 RPM Fine Grinding Process】Our cold press juicer adopts advanced multi-stage progressive extrusion and low-speed fine grinding technology, which greatly reduces the damage to the cell structure of fruits during juicing, effectively inhibits heat accumulation and oxidation reaction, and then locks in more nutrient essences and natural flavors in the fruits. 【All-around Efficient Design】This 350-watt high-power masticating juicer is equipped with a food-grade safety standard screw juicing assembly, which can easily cope with the processing needs of various fruits and vegetables. It is equipped with a double-layer precision filter, which can effectively separate pulp fibers, making the extracted juice taste more delicate and smooth, and the juicing efficiency can be as high as 99%. 【Convenient Cleaning Experience】Our all-in-one cold press juicer has a simple structure, consisting of only three main parts, and comes with a special cleaning tool, which makes assembly, disassembly and cleaning easy and quick. 【Troubleshooting Guide】To ensure that the juicer operates properly, please follow the following steps for troubleshooting: 1. When installing the juicer, make sure that the handle is precisely aligned with the starter button. 2. Make sure that the lid is closed tightly. After completing the above checks, if the problem persists, please contact us for your solution! Warm Tip 1: lt is recommended to cut the ingredients into 2cm³ pieces, remove pits/seeds/skinsto reduce the occurrence of clogging Warm Tip 2: To extend the service life of your juicer:1.Avoid using hot water above 50℃(122°F) during cleaning 2.Clean immediately after use, particularly after juicingacidic/corrosive foods (e.g., lemons)

name: Cold Press Juicer, 5.8" Extra Large Feed Chute Fit Whole Fruits & Vegetables, 350W Slow Masticating Juicer Machines, Easy to Clean,High Juice Yield（Grey）
short_description: 【 Simple and safe operation】We use knife-free design, when the lid is opened, the machine stops running, which not only improves the efficiency of juicing, but also ensures safety! 【 Large diameter feed tank】We made the 5.8 "feed tank 3 times larger than the normal feed tank. You can put whole apples and vegetables into jars instead of shredding them, which saves time and increases juicing efficiency. 【 Multi-functional and efficient】350W juicer, using 50rpm slow cold press technology, through multi-stage extrusion technology and low speed slow press technology, reduce heat generation and oxidation, so as to retain more nutrients and the original flavor of the fruit. 【 Anti-blocking and reverse function】If there is a blockage during the juicing process, just turn the reverse button, and the reverse button will rotate in reverse to remove all the blockage and ensure uninterrupted juicing. 【 Easy Disassembly and cleaning 】Our one-piece cold juicer has only three parts and comes with a special cleaning brush for quick assembly, disassembly and cleaning. 【 Troubleshooting Guide】To ensure the proper operation of the juicer, please follow these troubleshooting steps: 1.When installing the juicer, ensure that the handle is precisely aligned with the start button. 2.Ensure that the lid is tightly closed.After completing the above - mentioned checks, if the problem persists, please contact us for a solution!

name: Nama J2 Cold Press Juicer – Self Feeding for Hands-Free Operation with Wide Mouth Hopper for Whole Recipe Loading, Zero Waste Masticating Juicer For More Juice, Less Pulp – Easy Cleanup & Assembly
short_description: HANDS-FREE: Say goodbye to adding your produce one by one. The self-feeding hopper lets you load your entire recipe at once, freeing you to multitask in the kitchen. This juicing machine for fruits and vegetables ensures convenience and efficiency. SAVE TIME: Enjoy your juicing with our cold press juicer machine that cuts & juices produce for you. Simply add your fruits & vegetables & walk away while the J2 processes everything. Just add ingredients & enjoy fresh cold-pressed juice in minutes. MAXIMIZE YOUR JUICE OUTPUT: Designed to extract more from your favorite ingredients, this fruit & vegetable juicer efficiently processes leafy greens and other produce. Enjoy every drop with less waste compared to traditional juicer machines. DURABLE & EFFICIENT DESIGN: Powered by a 200 W motor, this masticating juicer machine operates quietly at 50 RPM for long-lasting performance. Includes all necessary components like juice containers, strainers, and guides for an all-in-one solution. EASY CLEANUP & ASSEMBLY: Our juice extractor machine simplifies your routine with quick-release parts, a cleaning brush, & easy assembly. Designed for your convenience, this cold press slow juicer offers a hassle-free experience from start to finish. Backed by a 15-year warranty for lasting quality and peace of mind.

name: AMZCHEF Cold Press Juicer, 5.4" Juicer Machines with Large Feed Chute for Whole Fruits & Vegetables, Stainless Steel Juice Extractor with Large Auger, Triple Strainers, Easy Cleanup & Assembly
short_description: 【5.4-Inch Reversible Wide Chute & Auto-Cutting Power】 Our 5.4-inch feed chute is perfectly sized to accommodate whole apples and veggies—no need for pre-cutting. Thanks to the powerful auto-cutting mechanism with dual crushing blades, your ingredients are sliced and juiced in a flash, saving you time and maximizing every drop of juice. 【No-Clog Cold Pressing for Pure, Smooth Juice】Our slow masticating juicer operates at a precise 60 RPM to reduce heat buildup and prevent clogging. The triple-layer strainer system expertly separates pulp from juice for a cleaner pour and better taste. 【Maximum Juice, Minimum Waste】The upgraded auger applies high pressure at a low speed, boosting juice yield—especially from hard fruits and vegetables. Less waste, more nutrition, and better value in every glass. 【Built to Last—Inside and Out】Crafted with a sleek stainless steel shell, this juicer is designed for performance and durability. Side ventilation prevents overheating during long sessions, and every component is engineered with precision—because quality and reliability matter. 【Pro Tips for Effortless Juicing】For best results: 1. Open the lid when assembling/removing the chute 2. Align the lock markers when attaching the juice cup 3.Got a blockage? Just press "REV" for 3–5 seconds. Need help? Our friendly support team is always ready to assist!

name: Tribest Slowstar SW-2000 Vertical Masticating Cold Press Juicer & Juice Extractor with Mincer, Red
short_description: ELECTRIC JUICER AND MINCER: Featuring a powerful 200-watt motor and 3-stage speed reduction gears, Slowstar masticating juicer provides slow, cold press juice extraction with 47 RPM which results in the best, fresh juices with minimal oxidation compared with juice from centrifugal juicers. DUO-BLADE ULTEM AUGER: The vertical cold press juicer features duo-blade that creates two times more cutting action. The auger rapidly cuts and crushes your produce while extracting more juice with less pulp. MINCING ATTACHMENT: Increase the versatility of Slowstar mincer chopper by turning it into a multi-purpose tool with the included mincing attachment which allows you to create your favorite recipes like sorbets from frozen culmination, entire food sauces and more. EASY TO CLEAN: Electric slow masticating cold press juicer comes with a cap that prevents leaks and drips while switching containers and is detachable for easy cleaning. Closing the cap and adding water to the auger housing helps to pre-rinse the juicing screen for easier cleanup. LIVE TRIBEST LIFE: At Tribrest, we provide you with quality products that will energize your life. Our motto is "Making healthy living easy" and we ensure that with our latest innovations and quality products like juicers, blenders, sprouters, dehydrators and other wellness and specialty items.
product_description: The Tribest Slowstar Vertical Slow Juicer and Mincer can quietly juice your favorite fruits and vegetables at a low speed of 47 RPM. 2-in-1 slow masticating juicer machine is the perfect solution to get the most out of your produce. The included mincing attachment transforms this Slowstar Tribest into a multi-purpose tool that allows you to create your favorite recipes like sorbets, nut butter, and sauces. It also made of Ultem, which is 8 times stronger. The duo-blade double edged auger does twice the work of single edged augers and provides a quality outcome. With a 200-watt motor and 3-stage speed reduction gears, this vertical slow juicer extractor preserves the freshness and quality of your juice due to friction and heat. Higher motor torque prevents jamming and unnecessary delays; it reduces overall stress on the machine and takes 3 times less amount of time to juice your favorite recipes.

name: Hurom H400 Easy Clean Slow Juicer, Matte Black | Hands Free | Hopper Fits Whole Produce | Quiet Motor | Scrub Free Cleaning | BPA Free | Easy Assembly | Healthy Living | Cold Press Masticating Juicer
short_description: EASY CLEAN TECHNOLOGY - The H400 is equipped with an Easy Clean chamber set, which includes a two-part auger and meshes together to strain out pulp-free juice. The individual parts all detach from each other which saves you on cleaning and scrubbing time. EASY ASSEMBLY - We’ve further streamlined the internal juicing mechanism, reducing the amount of pieces one needs to assemble to get started. The H400’s intuitive design is excellent for juicing veterans and beginners alike. LARGE SELF-FEEDING HOPPER - The H400 comes with a high volume self-feeding hopper. This change is complemented by a larger opening, and a larger inlet to add more ingredients while the juicer is still running. HIGH-YIELD - Our unique slow squeeze difference allows the auger to squeeze every single drop of juice out of your produce. This leaves you with the highest yield and the least amount of pulp across any Easy Clean model. INNOVATIVE DESIGN - The H400 continues our commitment to design excellence. It features a gauge window on the front of the body which highlights the rich colors of your juice, which also allows you to intuitively monitor how full its chamber is. STRAINER-FREE - Traditional juicers require a strainer which collects minerals over time, requiring extensive scrubbing. The H400 utilizes a revolutionary mechanism that minimizes pulp - even without a strainer. The strainer-like function is practically embedded within the chamber and the two-part auger meshes together to strain out pulp-free juice – which means bare minimum cleaning for high-quality juice!

name: AMZCHEF Juicer Machines, 5.8" Extra Self-Feeding Cold Press Juicer for Whole Vegetable & Fruit, Juice Extractor Machine with Large Auger & Triple Strainers, Easy to Clean, High Juice Yield, Black
short_description: [5.8-Inch Extra-Large Feed Chute]: Skip the prep work—our 5.8-inch wide feed chute lets you juice whole fruits and veggies with ease. No cutting, no hassle. The built-in smart safety lock automatically shuts off the juicer when the lid is opened, ensuring safe operation every time. [60 RPM Slow Juicing for Maximum Yield]: Extract up to 30% more juice with our 7-stage slow masticating system. Operating at just 60 RPM, it minimizes oxidation and preserves nutrients and flavor—all while reducing clogging and ensuring a smoother juicing process. [Triple Filtration System for Ultra-Smooth Juice]: Our exclusive triple-filter setup ensures cleaner pulp and higher juice yield. Designed for superior flow and maximum purity, the AMZCHEF juicer delivers a silky-smooth, nutrient-packed glass every time—better than most models on the market. [20 Years of Juicing Expertise, Built In]: Backed by two decades of innovation, the AMZCHEF SJ-036 features a precision-engineered design using premium materials for long-lasting performance. Durable, efficient, and built to last—it's the juicer you can count on every day. [Helpful Tips for Smooth Operation]: For best results, make sure to: 1. Keep the lid open when assembling or removing the chute. 2.Align the locking markers when attaching the juice cup. 3.If there's a blockage, switch to “REV” for 3–5 seconds. Still need help? Our support team is always here for you!

name: Cold Press Juicer，Aeitto 4.9" Large Feed Chute Juicer Machines for Whole Fruits & Vegetables,Self Feeding,Professional Slow Juicer Easy to Clean,Grey
short_description: 【4.9" Large Feed Chute】With 4.9 inch extra large feed chute, the fruit juicer is suitable for whole vegetables and fruits. You can add whole-sized apples, oranges and etc without cutting, saving 50% preparation time 【Slow Cold Press Juicer】The 50rpm speed maximizes the retention of the nutrient-fee components in the fruit and reduces oxidation, so you can enjoy fresh juices with natural flavors 【Upgraded Blade Pre-cutting Technology 】The slow juicer adopts a brand-new cutting pre-treatment technology, where the built-in blades will cut the fruits and vegetables into small pieces before cold pressing, making the juicing process more efficient 【Easy to Disassemble and Clean 】The hopper & screen integrated design makes this masticating juicer has fewer parts,easy to assemble and disassemble. In addition, it can be easily cleaned with just water after using. And the equipped brush can effectively remove residual pulp 【Safety Design】The juicer machine will automatically stop working when the hopper cover is opened, ensuring your safety and preventing children from being injured by accidentally opening the machine 【After-sale Service 】 We provide 12 months of repair & replacement services and 7*24 hours online consultation services for this cold pressed juicer machines, please reach out to us if products have any problems. Aeitto specializes in providing buyers with high-quality small appliance products and the best user experience

name: nutribullet Slow Juicer, Slow Masticating Juicer Machine, Easy to Clean, Quiet Motor & Reverse Function, BPA-Free, Cold Press Juicer with Brush, 150 Watts, Charcoal Black, NBJ50300, 24-oz
short_description: Don’t let its compact size fool you, the nutribullet Slow Juicer is equipped from top to bottom to handle major juicing. Its wide 3" feed chute fits larger quantities of produce, while its high-torque, low-speed motor and durable steel-tipped auger wring every drop of deep nutrition from your favorite fruits and veggies. STRONG & STEADY: High-torque, low-speed motor quietly spins at 65 RPM to crush and squeeze deep nutrition out of fruits and veggies. MAJOR CRUSH: Ultra-compact size and durable steel-tipped auger provide sleek strength and more juice to your morning routine. BUILT TO LAST: The nutribullet Slow Juicer is made from durable plastic, with a stainless steel-tipped auger and stainless-steel sieve. EASY TO CLEAN: Designed for easy clean up: our no-drip spout and dishwasher-safe components take the chore out of juicing. It also features a no-drip spout that keeps your juice mixing until you’re ready to fill your glass. The NutriBullet Slow Juicer comes with (1) 150W motor base, (1) juice bowl with no-drip spout, (1) grinding assembly (1) 24-oz juice container (1) pulp container, (1) screen-cleaning brush, and (1) User & Recipe Guide Assembled Dimensions: 7" L X 6.25" W X 17" H
product_description: The NutriBullet® Slow Juicer takes a quiet approach to squeezing deep nutrition out of fruits and vegetables, allowing you to make refreshing and healthful juice, every day.

name: ACOQOOS Juicer Machines, 5.3" Wide Chute for Whole Fruit and Vegetable,1.8L Auto-Feed Time-Saver, Slow Masticating High Yield, Easy to Clean Cold Press Juicer with 2 Cups
short_description: 5.3" Feeding Chute: Discover the power of our 300W masticating juicer. With a large 5.3" feeding chute, it's easy to assemble, operate, and clean. You can easily add whole apples and veggies directly into the wider and larger feed chute. The automatic feeding design ensures a quick, fresh, and flavorful glass of juice every time 99% Superior Juice Extraction: Experience the exceptional juice yield of our 300W masticating juicer, efficiently extracting every drop of juice with a remarkable 99% yield. Enjoy smoother, pulp-free juice with unbeatable taste BPA-free for Your Well-being: With our BPA-free juicer, you can confidently enjoy fresh juice. Savor the pure, natural flavors of your favorite fruits and vegetables without the concern of harmful chemicals Easy to Clean: The juicer is simple to clean and assemble, ideal for anyone who avoids complex systems. It has a single auger and a filter without metal, reducing the number of parts to handle Overheat Protection and Automatic Stop When Lid is Opened: The slow juicer will activate the overheat protection function after continuous use for 30 minutes. It can be used again after cooling down for 30 minutes. When you open the lid to add fruits and vegetables, the machine will stop working, ensuring safe use even for children. Make sure to close the lid tightly before turning on the machine. Worry-free Guarantee: With ACOQOOS, enjoy a robust 2-year warranty, providing you with peace of mind.
